item.Q:
0 0 2500 English-Croatian flash cards
Version 0.92 - June 26, 2009
Numbers are card number and rank - see http://us.metamath.org/hr.html
item.A: (Click 5 in Mnemosyne to dispatch this message.)

item.Q: 9 7 that (e.g. "I know that you are right") [cj]
12 9 of (containing the measured quantity: "two liters of water") [prep]
29 26 on (resting on; touching the top or other surface of) [prep]
30 27 your (pl., sing. pol.) (m/f/n/m pl/f pl/n pl) [pn]
item.A: vaš / vaša / vaše / vaši / vaše / vaša

item.Q: 37 34 all (the whole number or entire sum of) (m/f/n) [aj]

item.A: jesi, si / jesmo, smo / jeste, ste / jesu, su

item.Q: 43 39 about (pertaining to; on the topic of) [prep]
45 40 right (a right to do or be ...) [n]

item.A: njezin, njen / njezina, njena / njezino, njeno / njezini, njeni
mogu / možeš / može / možemo / možete / mogu

item.Q: 63 57 go (move from starting point to elsewhere) [v]
66 59 at most, only, just, merely, not more than (<=) [av]
81 75 time (e.g. "do it 3 times"), occasion, instance, iteration [n]
82 75 time (the dimension or continuum of past-present-future) [n] 2s

item.A: ću / ćeš / će / ćemo / ćete / će

item.Q: 98 101 take (in the sense of E-o "preni", G "nehmen", Sp "tomar") [v]
102 105 little (to a small degree; with almost no intensity) [av]
104 106 make, render (impart quality X to Y; e.g. "I make you happy") [v]
125 131 very, much (with great intensity; to a large degree) [av]
126 132 by means of, via, per, with (using; through instrumentality of) [prep]
128 134 should, ought to (is or are expected or advised to ...) [aux-v-pres]
143 151 people (a people), folk, the members of an ethnic group or nation [n]
146 153 still, yet (even until the time mentioned) [av]

item.A: nazvati, pozvati, prizvati / zvati, pozivati, prizivati

item.Q: 155 165 before, in front of, ahead of (spatially) [prep]
156 165 before, prior to, earlier than, ago [prep]
170 180 after (later than; in the future of) [prep] 3s
174 183 day (daytime -- as opposed to night), diurnal period [n]
175 184 keep, retain, go on having (e.g. "you should keep this book") (pf/impf) [v]
190 212 new, novel, recent (having been known for a brief time) [aj]
211 249 own (possess according to law or custom) [v]

item.A: moram / moraš / mora / moramo / morate / moraju

item.A: da, čini se, čini se da
